languages.text: [Кинуться в ноги пилоту] "Заклинаю, именем Лорд-капитана! Нужно наверх, сейчас же — династия фон Валанциус в опасности!"
[Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"
languages.original_text: [Кинуться в ноги пилоту] "Заклинаю, именем Лорд-капитана! Нужно наверх, сейчас же — династия фон Валанциус в опасности!"

languages.text: [跪在驾驶员脚边]“我以舰长大人的名义恳求你，我们必须得赶紧前往塔顶！冯·瓦兰修斯王朝已经岌岌可危了！”
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [跪在驾驶员脚边]“我以舰长大人的名义恳求你，我们必须得赶紧前往塔顶！冯·瓦兰修斯王朝已经岌岌可危了！”

languages.text: [Lanzarte a los pies del piloto] «¡Se lo imploro en nombre de{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Debemos llegar arriba de inmediato, ¡la dinastía von Valancius corre peligro!».
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [Lanzarte a los pies del piloto] «¡Se lo imploro en nombre de{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Debemos llegar arriba de inmediato, ¡la dinastía von Valancius corre peligro!».

languages.text: [Pilotun ayaklarına kapan] "Lord Kaptan adına yalvarırım! Derhâl yukarı çıkmalıyız. Von Valancius hanedanlığı tehlikede!"
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [Pilotun ayaklarına kapan] "Lord Kaptan adına yalvarırım! Derhâl yukarı çıkmalıyız. Von Valancius hanedanlığı tehlikede!"

languages.text: [パイロットの足元に身を投げ出す]「ロード・キャプテンの名にかけて、お願い申し上げます！直ちに上階へ行かねばなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が危機に瀕しています！」
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [パイロットの足元に身を投げ出す]「ロード・キャプテンの名にかけて、お願い申し上げます！直ちに上階へ行かねばなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が危機に瀕しています！」

languages.text: [Se jeter aux pieds du pilote] « Je vous en supplie, au nom {rt_mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous devons aller à l'étage ! La dynastie von Valancius est en danger ! »
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [Se jeter aux pieds du pilote] « Je vous en supplie, au nom {rt_mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous devons aller à l'étage ! La dynastie von Valancius est en danger ! »

languages.text: [Dem Piloten zu Füßen werfen] "Ich flehe Euch an, im Namen des Lord Captains! Wir müssen sofort nach oben ... die Dynastie derer von Valancius ist in Gefahr!"
languages.original_text: [Throw yourself at the pilot's feet] "I implore you, in the Lord Captain's name! We need to get upstairs immediately — the von Valancius dynasty is in peril!"

traits.locale_text: [Dem Piloten zu Füßen werfen] "Ich flehe Euch an, im Namen des Lord Captains! Wir müssen sofort nach oben ... die Dynastie derer von Valancius ist in Gefahr!"
